enumerations.name: SignalServiceTranslationControlEnum
enumerations.note: This enumeration allows to define how the service instance offer/subscribe control shall behave. Aggregated by SignalServiceTranslationProps.serviceControl

literals.name: allPartialNetworksActive
literals.description:
Defines the start of service control when all specified partial networks are active.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=3

literals.name: anyPartialNetworkActive
literals.description:
Defines the start of service control when any specified partial network is active.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=4

literals.name: partialNetwork
literals.description:
Defines the start of service control when specific partial networks are active.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: serviceDiscovery
literals.description:
Defines the start of service control when other service is available.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=2

literals.name: translationStart
literals.description:
Defines the start of service control at translation start.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0
